title: >>> The Dodgeball ANTHOLOGY: Volume 2
body_text:
LAUREN WINSTON & DIANA DIBUCCIO v. LAUREN STOPA & VALERIE WINSTON
Two years of non-stop mayhem had come to this. The fierce females of dodgeball ruled with an iron fist as four of the greats stepped onto the court they helped create, waging war like never before!
DAY 1's finest rose to the occasion fast and furious as legends Diana DiBuccio and Lauren Winston gained the early lead in the opening rounds of this 102nd extravaganza.
The sadistic massacre wouldn't stop there either as the youngest Winston and the self-appointed referee remorselessly unleashed hell as the night progressed. Though the resilient pairing of Stopa and V. Winston did manage to secure two wins, the eventual outcome was obvious from the getgo.
All four iconic ladies fought to the very end and are certainly admired and respected for their effort. Diana DiBuccio and Lauren Winston defeated Valerie Winston and Lauren Stopa at dodgeball's
Two Year Anniversary Special
, DODGEBALL 102.
Moments & Stars
: The numerous faceshots mercilessly given to Valerie Winston, Mike Miow, among others; the superb plays by both Lauren Winston and rival Lauren Stopa; Luke's free pizza and the annual celebratory cake thanks to Diana DiBuccio and the Winston Sisters
ONE Year Later ... TWO Years Later
Below is a list of those who competed at both DODGEBALL 102 and last year's
One Year Anniversary
, DODGEBALL 54
:
Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, Kevin Megill, Lauren Stopa, Lauren Winston, Melissa Kerr, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Tom Adams, Valerie Winston, Zach Katz.
RECORDS
> Attendance: 29
> New Players: (1) Ryan Miow
- The poster/logo was created after the event's conclusion; a rarity for the sport.
- As already noted, the yearly celebratory ice cream cake was enjoyed by all in attendance. Luke also played a part at the T.Y.A. bringing several boxes of pizza much to the delight of participants and spectators alike.
- DODGEBALL 102 featured the first female-only team attraction, which saw Lauren Winston and Diana DiBuccio defeat Lauren Stopa and Valerie Winston 5 to 2.
...
L. Winston
competed at DODGEBALL DAY 1 and last year's O.Y.A. (DODGEBALL 54), both times against her sister Valerie. This victory improves her record to 4-4-1.
...
D. DiBuccio
broke her finger at last year's DODGEBALL 54 and has passionately participated to this very day. Her current standing is 3-4-2.
...
L. Stopa
suffered an unfortunate third loss as captain. She is 0-3-0, perhaps the worst female record ever.
...
V. Winston
competed at DODGEBALL DAY 1 and last year's O.Y.A. (DODGEBALL 54), both times against her sister Lauren. This loss puts her at 3-3-1.
________________________________________
_______
DODGEBALL 103: Six-Man Warfare Returns!
September 8, 2007
The ongoing saga continues between blocking expert Ray Marzarella and reckless dodger Sascha Basista! Following the success of the phenomenal DODGEBALL 100 comes just the second three versus three encounter, featuring the sports hottest commodities!
Ray Marzarella
teams with
PondScum
veterans
Gerald Lewis
and
Dan Turner
to face the formitable threesome of
Sascha Basista
, the colorful
Joey Smalls
, and prodigy
Robert Pellecchia
! One of the biggest bouts, literally, in the history of the game!

The sadistic massacre wouldn't stop there either as the youngest Winston and the self-appointed referee remorselessly unleashed hell as the night progressed. Though the resilient pairing of Stopa and V. Winston did manage to secure two wins, the eventual outcome was obvious from the getgo.

All four iconic ladies fought to the very end and are certainly admired and respected for their effort. Diana DiBuccio and Lauren Winston defeated Valerie Winston and Lauren Stopa at dodgeball's Two Year Anniversary Special, DODGEBALL 102.

DODGEBALL 103: Six-Man Warfare Returns!
September 8, 2007

The ongoing saga continues between blocking expert Ray Marzarella and reckless dodger Sascha Basista! Following the success of the phenomenal DODGEBALL 100 comes just the second three versus three encounter, featuring the sports hottest commodities!

Ray Marzarella teams with PondScum veterans Gerald Lewis and Dan Turner to face the formitable threesome of Sascha Basista, the colorful Joey Smalls, and prodigy Robert Pellecchia! One of the biggest bouts, literally, in the history of the game!
